record.title: EXPRESSING THE THANKS OF THE SENATE TO SENATOR TED STEVENS AND DESIGNATION AS PRESIDENT PRO TEMPORE EMERITUS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I send a resolution to the desk.

speaking-unknown-id.name: The Vice President
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: The clerk will report the resolution by title.

record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking-unknown-id.name: The Vice President
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Without objection, the resolution is agreed to.
The resolution (S. Res. 6) was agreed to, as follows:
Resolved, That the United States Senate expresses its deepest gratitude to Senator TED STEVENS for his dedication and commitment during his service to the Senate as the President Pro Tempore.
Further, as a token of appreciation of the Senate for his long and faithful service, Senator TED STEVENS is hereby designated President Pro Tempore Emeritus of the United States Senate.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I move to reconsider the vote.
I move to lay that motion on the table.

record.narrative: The motion to lay on the table was agreed to.
